Tag_Youmay.description: the genetic memory | the [[Nemean Lion | legendary beast]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'The Nemean Lion held Argolis in a grip of fear - those who roamed into the wilds rarely returned. Though it was a killer, Kassandra saw in it a noble beauty, and was sad she had to slay it.'

General_Description: '''The Nemean Lion''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: At the request of [[Daphnae]], the acting leader of the [[Daughters of Artemis]], Kassandra hunted down the fabled [[Nemean Lion]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra travelled to the [[Sinkholes of Herakles]] in [[Argolis]], finding the lion at its lair, along with its pack mates.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''King of beasts.''
Kassandra entered the lair and engaged the lion and its pack, eventually killing them, claiming the legendary lion's pelt.

Kassandra returned to Daphnae to deliver the pelt.
*'''Daphnae:''' ''Beast Slayer, I'm glad to see you again.''
("I have the Nemean Lion pelt.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The Nemean Lion's pelt.''
Kassandra handed the pelt over to Daphnae.
*'''Daphnae:''' ''Magnificent, as is its hunter.''
<tabber>
|-|I am magnificent.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I won't argue with that.''
*'''Daphnae:''' ''The gods must envy your humility.''
|-|Flirt – So are you.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Strength is powerless in the face of beauty. Even [[Herakles|Heracles]] fell to its sway.''
*'''Daphnae:''' ''You slay me as easily with your words as your weapons do these beasts.''
{{#tag:tabber|
No more talking.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You haven't seen anything yet.''
Kassandra drew closer to Daphnae and the two shared an intimate moment.
{{!}}-{{!}}
Some other time.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Speaking of beasts, we should talk about the others.''
}}
</tabber>
(Leave – "I'll return soon.")
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll return when I have more pelts.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and killed the Nemean Lion, recovering its pelt for Daphnae. In return, she received [[Pandora's Kopis]] as a reward.
Section_Trivia: *The dialogue leading to the intimate moment is only truly available if a previous Flirt option, from either dialogue or handing over a different pelt, has been taken beforehand.  Otherwise, the dialogue is skipped even if the preceding Flirt option is taken here.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
